TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlUrlEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor

summary.span: 为选择指示 XML 文件位置的 URL 提供用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting a URL that indicates the location of an XML file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个 ，它提供用于选择指示 XML 文件位置的 URL 的对话框。 is a that provides a dialog for selecting a URL that indicates the location of an XML file. ## Examples [!code-cpp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebUITypeEditorsExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#3)]

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Caption As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取要在选择对话窗口中显示的标题。

span.span: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog window.

value.span: 要在选择对话窗口中显示的标题。

span.span: The caption to display on the selection dialog window.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Filter As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取编辑器的文件名筛选器字符串。

span.span: Gets the file name filter string for the editor.

summary.span: 这用来确定在对话框的文件列表中显示的项。

span.span: This is used to determine the items that appear in the file list of the dialog box.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含对话框中可用的文件筛选选项的信息。

span.span: A string that contains information about the file filtering options available in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定包含两个筛选器选项的筛选器字符串：一个用于 XML 文件 ( \* .xml) ，另一个用于 (.) 的所有文件 \* \* 。The property specifies a filter string with two filter options: one for XML files (\*.xml), and one for all files (\*.\*). 筛选器字符串包含一个或多个筛选选项。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每个筛选器选项都包含筛选器的说明，后跟竖线 ( # A0) 和筛选器模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 不同筛选选项的字符串用竖线分隔。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 下面是包含两个筛选器选项的筛选器字符串的示例： " `XML Files (*.xml)|*.xml|All Files (*.*)|*.*` "。The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`XML Files (*.xml)|*.xml|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 您可以通过用分号分隔筛选器模式，在筛选器选项中指定多个筛选器模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 下面是一个筛选器字符串的示例，其中第一个筛选器选项指定了两个筛选器模式： " `Custom XML Files (*.xml;*.xlst)|*.xml;*.xlst|All Files (*.*)|*.*` "。The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies two filter patterns: "`Custom XML Files (*.xml;*.xlst)|*.xml;*.xlst|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Options As UrlBuilderOptions

summary.span: 获取 URL 生成器要使用的选项。

span.span: Gets the options for the URL builder to use.

value.span: 一个 ，它指示要使用的 URL 生成器选项。

span.span: A that indicates the options for the URL builder to use.
